articles.title: Belarus threatens to cut gas supplies to Europe if EU imposes new sanctions - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Pressure is building to address the plight of migrants who are stuck at the Belarus-Poland border in freezing weather.

articles.title: Belarus leader Lukashenko threatens to cut Europe's gas supply - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Belarusian leader ordered a tough response if the European Union imposes new sanctions over a migration crisis.
articles.content:
Warning that Belarus would not tolerate the closure of its borders, he told the leadership of Poland, Lithuanians and other brainless figures to think before speaking.
